data.title: Charles Mann Biography
data.meta_description: View the biography of San Francisco 49ers Defensive End Charles Mann on ESPN. Includes career history and teams played for.
data.text:
How did the 49ers work out a deal with Brandon Aiyuk?

Adam Schefter details to Scott Van Pelt how the 49ers finally got a deal done with WR Brandon Aiyuk.

2024 NFL deal tracker: Contract and training camp updates

As NFL training camps open, we're checking in with the latest contract and participation updates for Brandon Aiyuk, Trent Williams and others.

Chargers' Joey Bosa had surgery, will wear club on hand

Chargers linebacker Joey Bosa revealed he had surgery to repair a broken hand suffered earlier this month and will wear a club during games for a portion of the season.

Brandon Aiyuk inks extension with the 49ers

Check out the numbers and key statistics behind Brandon Aiyuk's contract extension with the 49ers.

49ers, WR Brandon Aiyuk realized they are better together

After not practicing the entire preseason and training camp, Aiyuk agreed to a new four-year contract Thursday.
